content: this is a crochet pattern for a cute christmas crochet basket jane it is quite easy and fast to make and it looks beautiful the pattern includes - written instructions in us terms - abbreviations used - pattern notes - photo instructions - links to additional photo tutorials on my website for all stitches used in this pattern materials and tools you will need - yarn any thin yarn will work i used tencel 100% lyocell 50 g = 141 m colors red 318291 and white 318290 - crochet hook size recommended on your yarn label i used size 2 0 - tapestry needle measurements - diameter 10 0 cm - height 4 0 cm 8 0 cm when not folded in you can purchase a pdf pattern at the nordic hook shop here 1 join nordic hook club to get all ad-free patterns stitch tutorials and e-books in pdf format here 2 1 https //nordichookshop com/products/christmas-crochet-basket-jane 2 https //nordichookclub com/sign-up/
